Rent your own Minecraft game server from Nitrado now and get started. Due to the large Minecraft community, countless options for plugins and modifications are available with which you can create a game server according to your ideas. The configurations can be set up directly via the web interface provided on all servers. Alternatively, if this seems too complicated, Nitrado can quickly and easily upload the most popular modpacks to its own MC server via a one-click installation.

That’s what Minecraft is all about

In the multiplayer game Minecraft, which was designed by the computer game company Mojang from Stockholm, players can create constructions from mostly cube-shaped formations in a three-dimensional environment. In addition, they can explore the 3D world of Minecraft, collect resources, assert themselves against beasts and further develop their cuboid structures into other objects. A prescribed plan does not exist for the players, rather their own ingenuity and imagination, which flows into the gaming experience, are in the foreground. If you start with Minecraft, the player comes into an initially strange, randomly generated environment, without tools or other objects. Therefore, the goal of the first activities is to get your own equipment and explore the new landscapes. At this point, the player is free to choose which direction their adventure should take. For example, he can immediately tackle the construction of imposing buildings, explore widely branched cave systems and dungeons, or explore the legendary Minecraft world with its various biomes. Many Minecraft players also say again and again that this computer game comes very close to playing with virtual Lego bricks.

Start now with game hosting provider Nitrado

To take part in this fantastic world and experience exciting adventures there, all you have to do is rent a prepaid MC game server from Nitrado, the world’s leading game hosting provider – very cheap, version changes with one click are possible without any problems. You can also install plugins and mod packs quickly and easily and create your own Minecraft server. The following additional server modifications and versions can be rented from Nitrado:

Minecraft
Minecraft AT
Minecraft Bedrock
Minecraft mini game
Minecraft Technic Platform
